Definitions: before; marks that something happens before affected verb
after; marks that something happens after affected verb

Adlam: ぅぎぃきえかじかえきずき

Definitions: creates reflexive pronouns from personal or demonstrative pronouns
so that; marks affected verb as purpose behind something else
needle; splinter; small thin sharp object
however; marks the affected verb in opposition to a prior predicate

Adlam: ぜきこきぅぎすあすぎ
ずあぃあがぎじかいきずき
こきぜかすかこぎずき

Definitions: thus; marks the affected verb as the result of another event
